message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $160 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more than that to me. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Can you meet me there?
